Plot and predict Cesium use based on resevoir mass.

TODO: add data for CFAMS
TODO: calculate days since new Cs
TODO: calculate res mass from initial mass

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(lubridate)

cs <- read.csv("cesium.csv")
cs$Date <- mdy(cs$Date)
cs$CsMass <- cs$Mass - 406.6
cs <- filter(cs, Date < "2017-03-09")
cs.lm <- lm(Mass ~ Date, data = cs)
cs.lm
ggplot(cs, aes(Date, CsMass)) +
  geom_smooth(method = "lm", fullrange = TRUE) +
  geom_point() + 
  expand_limits(x=mdy("07/01/16")) 
```
